content: this legal text discusses the division of ownership of several real estate properties between two parties mr cr and mrs cml the properties include apartments a warehouse and a garage located in the municipality of osimo the cadastral income and total value of each property are specified the parties agree to divide the ownership into two quotas with mr cr receiving one quota and mrs cml receiving the other the specific properties attributed to each party are listed along with their cadastral data and values mrs cml makes a balance payment to mr cr and a receipt is issued to confirm the settlement
